articles.title: Popular 95-octane petrol hikes to cross $3 mark, with Shell leading at $3.06 per litre - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - The most popular grade of petrol has breached the $3 mark after a series of rapid rises accelerated by the Ukraine crisis. Shell raised its posted price of 95-octane fuel by eight cents to $3.06 per litre on Monday (March 7) morning, following at …
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - The most popular grade of petrol has breached the $3 mark after a series of rapid rises accelerated by the Ukraine crisis.
